data.title: 以至少 50 个字回答问题
data.content: "Describe ways in which individuals can help end prejudice and discrimination in their social circles."
data.answer: The first and most crucial way in the fight against prejudice and discrimination is recognizing them and acknowledging that we are all affected by them. Everyone has definite ideas about certain groups of people that never apply to all members of that group. If you are and remain aware of this fact, you have already taken the most significant step. We should also make sure that our own prejudices do not determine our behavior. Prejudice should never lead to exclusion or discrimination against others. Also, make sure that you do not spread your own prejudices. We also need to react! If someone around you hurts other people, insults entire groups, or uses prejudice to define them, react. Oppose them! React in your own circle of friends and acquaintances, respond on social media. You can ask people to tone it down. You can discuss the issue or make yourself heard in another way. You can let people know that you are not okay with offensive or insulting prejudices - whether they affect others or yourself. （174 字）
